channel.title: Uppsala on Georgios Karamanis
channel.description: Recent content in Uppsala on Georgios Karamanis

item.title: Week 15
item.description: An impromptu photo shoot last Monday with Marius at Må bra massage. I’ve been a happy customer of his for many years and can’t recommend him highly enough.

item.title: Week 1
item.description: Another weekly photo journal, this year it is in black and white.

item.title: Week 26
item.description: Welcome Angles Buildings And the rest

item.title: Week 21
item.description: This week, even more buildings (again) Even more facades and walls (again) Trees and verticals And my forehead

item.title: Week 19
item.description: This week had a lot of facades It had more buildings but in perspective It had a few people And, finally, some plants

item.title: Week 18
item.description: Facades, windows and a lot of geometry Trees and other verticals Abandonment

item.title: Week 16
item.description: Water Birds Shadows Red vehicles Obscured

item.title: Week 15
item.description: The spring is here Oh, the sun and the buildings! Light and shadow play indoors Music!

item.title: Week 14
item.description: Buildings with or without shadows Back to work The end of winter

item.title: Week 12
item.description: Sunny days Exercises in minimalism and geometry Light and shadow play

item.title: Week 11
item.description: A trip to Stockholm Buildings Daily weirdness Cold shadows

item.title: Week 10
item.description: Snow looks nice in black and white Snow looks nice in color

item.title: Windy Uppsala
item.description: First try to do an panning time-lapse video outdoors. A bit shaky because of the strong wind. Music: purple planet

item.title: B&W panoramas
item.description: A couple more panoramas from Uppsala. Added them in this post with all the panoramas taken this winter. Click on the images to view them bigger.

item.description: Some of the panoramas I've taken with my iPhone this winter. Click on the images to view them bigger.

item.title: Rainy days are over
item.description: Just a few days ago I got my new camera, a Ricoh GRD IV. Here the first “test” shots.

item.title: People in geometry
item.description: Niklas and I went for another photowalk yesterday. Uppsala, Sweden

item.title: Valborg
item.description: It wasn't only the cows that were celebrating on Valborg in Uppsala.

item.title: Around the station
item.description: Three weeks ago Niklas and I went for a photowalk around the Central Station in Uppsala.

item.title: Holy cow!
item.description: Today it's Valborg in Uppsala and even the cows are celebrating.
